org.mapsforge.android.maps
Class MapController

java.lang.Object
  org.mapsforge.android.maps.MapController
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnKeyListener
public final class MapController
extends Object
implements android.view.View.OnKeyListener

A MapController is used to programmatically modify the position and zoom level of a MapView. Each MapController is assigned to a single MapView instance. To retrieve a MapController for a given MapView, use the MapView.getController() method.

Method Summary
 boolean onKey(android.view.View view, int keyCode, android.view.KeyEvent keyEvent)

 boolean zoomIn()
          Increases the zoom level of the MapView, unless the maximum zoom level has been reached.
 boolean zoomOut()
          Decreases the zoom level of the MapView, unless the minimum zoom level has been reached.

setCenter

public void setCenter(org.mapsforge.core.GeoPoint geoPoint)
Sets the center of the MapView without an animation to the given point.

Parameters:
geoPoint - the new center point of the map.

setZoom

public int setZoom(int zoomLevel)
Sets the zoom level of the MapView.

Parameters:
zoomLevel - the new zoom level, will be limited by the maximum and minimum possible zoom level.
Returns:
the new zoom level.

zoomIn

public boolean zoomIn()
Increases the zoom level of the MapView, unless the maximum zoom level has been reached.

Returns:
true if the zoom level has been changed, false otherwise.

zoomOut

public boolean zoomOut()
Decreases the zoom level of the MapView, unless the minimum zoom level has been reached.

Returns:
true if the zoom level has been changed, false otherwise.
